title: Nenjil Maamazhai Lyrics Nimir
stanzas:
nenjil maamazhai
nenjil maamazhai
thanthu vaanam
koothaada.

konjum thamarai
konjum thamarai
vandhu engum
poothaada.

ethanai naal ethanai naal
paarapathu.
etti nindru etti nindru
kaaivadhu.

kallakural padal
ulle oduthu.
kanmoodi kanmoodi
kathoram paaduthu.

nenjil maamazhai
nenjil maamazhai
thanthu vaanam
koothaada.

konjum thamarai
konjum thamarai
vandhu engum
poothaada.

varathil ethanai naal
paarpathu
andaraam vandhu parka
yaengudhu.

vaaramal pogum naatkal
veen ena.
vambaaga sandai poda
vaikuthu.

solla ponaal
en natkalai
vannam poosi
thanthavalum nethaan.

thullalillaa
en paarvaiyil
thoondil meenaai
vandhavazhum neethaan.

ethanai naal ethanai naal
paarapathu.
etti nindru etti nindru
kaaivadhu.

kallakural padal
ulle oduthu.
kanmoodi kanmoodi
kathoram paaduthu.
nenjil maamazhai ...

paasangu seithathellam
podhume
rasaavai thaedi
kangal odume.

rosapoo mazhai rendu
vendume
pesaamal maatri kolla
thoondume.

pengal illaa en veettile
padham vaithu neeyum
vara vendum.

thendral illaa en thottathil
unnaalthaane katru
varum meendum.

ethanai naal ethanai naal
paarapathu.
etti nindru etti nindru
kaaivadhu.

kallakural padal
ulle oduthu.
kanmoodi kanmoodi
kathoram paaduthu.

nenjil maamazhai ...
nenjil maamazhai ...
